name: Mordant Snare
movement: 30 ft. walking speed and 10 ft. burrowing speed
description: The Mordant Snare is a grotesque gargantuan aberration with a chaotic evil nature, capable of creating puppets from slain humanoids. It has substantial tentacles and a menacing bite, along with a keen ability to ambush its enemies.
memorable: Its unique ability to turn humanoids into puppets under its control makes it particularly dangerous and memorable.
goals: To manipulate others through its puppets and dominate the battlefield with ambush tactics.
relations: It may serve or be summoned by other chaotic or evil entities, and it could command its Mordant Puppets as minions.
environment: Commonly found underground or in dark locations, where it can ambush unsuspecting prey.
strengths: High hit points and resistance to nonmagical physical damage enhance its survivability.
weaknesses: Low Charisma hinders its social interactions and may limit its tactical options in negotiation.
attacks: The creature can deliver powerful melee attacks with its bite and tentacles, as well as ranged acid spikes, making it highly versatile in combat.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to create Mordant Puppets from slain humanoids allows it to control additional combatants.
senses: Possesses darkvision and tremorsense, allowing it to navigate effectively in darkness and through the ground.
skills: Proficient in Deception, making it adept at misleading others during encounters.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage on spell saving throws.
Can use its Hidden Trap ability to surprise attack from beneath the ground.
Can grapple opponents with its tentacles, enhancing its tactical positioning.
Keeps up to twelve Mordant Puppets under its control.
test_queries: Gargantuan monster that creates puppets from dead humanoids
chaotic evil creature with ambush tactics
grotesque aberration that attacks from underground
monster with tentacle attacks and acid damage
formidable creature with magic resistance and high hit points
